## PlayerCameraEventPayloads."PLAYER\_CAMERA.SET\_FILM\_OFFSET" property

Emitted when the film offset of the camera is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerCameraEvent.SET_FILM_OFFSET]: {
        playerCamera: PlayerCamera;
        filmOffset: number;
    };
```
